title: Ticket #5230: condor_vacate should merge constraints with machine names
description:
sudo condor_vacate mem1.chtc.wisc.edu -constraint 'RemoteOwner =!= "bchen79@chtc.wisc.edu" && RemoteOwner =!= "fmoya@chtc.wisc.edu"'

The above began vacating the entire pool. (most likely because the explicit -constaint overrode the implied constraint of the machine name.)

Investigation of the code indicates that all condor_tool commands ignore most other arguments when passed -constraint. (it hits the same code path as passing -all).
creator: lmichael
